modName: Three Friends Companions For Hire Adult
descriptionHtml:
I TOOK DOWN OLD FILE AND PUT UP NEW ONE

Three friends looking for work,and no place to stay broke into the Breezehome in Whiterun and are slumming in there. All of them are naked so equip with what you want.

Hannah is a Redguard spellsword 
Ivaana is a Nord archer
Tricia is a Dark Elf barbarian

The main file has them at level 15 and they level up with you and they can be married and are essential



Required mods
CHSBHC - BBP - Nude and Jiggly Mod by CherryHotaling
http://www.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4888

ApachiiSkyHair by Apachii
http://www.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168 FEMALE HAIR FILE

Better Females by Bella by BellaGail
http://www.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2812 JUST THE MAIN FILE

Amazing Smooth Females Complete by Zalzama
http://www.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/140 SMOOTHER FEMALE FACES FILE
author: mylittleduck
